Package edu.monash.fit2099.bids

Class Bid

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.bids.Bid
public class Bid extends Object
the bid class consists of these private attributes: bidID: an ID attached to a bid, generated randomly with no user input, the randomizer is placed in the vehicle class
See Also:
bidDate: a date attached to a bid bidPrice: the price of the bid

  • Constructor Details

    • Bid

      public Bid​(String bidID, String bidDate, int bidPrice)
      a method with bid ID, bid Price, and bid Date
      Parameters:
      bidID - - the bidder's ID
      bidDate - - the date the bid takes place
      bidPrice - - the price of the bid

    • Bid

      public Bid​(String bidDate, int bidPrice) throws BidException
      This method is where it checked if both bidDate and bidPrice was valid if either of them was invalid, then it will throw an exception
      Parameters:
      bidPrice - - the price of the bid
      bidDate - - the date of the bid
      Throws:
      BidException - - Custom exception, for when something does wrong with the bid inputs

    • setBidDate

      public boolean setBidDate​(String bidDate)
      a boolean method to set the bidDate, which will only let users set the bidDate when it is considered as valid. There are two validations, one is their format which is managed by dateFormat The other validation is making sure the numbers inputted are valid days, month, and year managed by an if statement
      Parameters:
      bidDate - - the date the bid takes place
      Returns:
      isValid

    • getBidPrice

      public int getBidPrice()
      method to extract the bid price
      Returns:
      bidPrice

    • setBidPrice

      public boolean setBidPrice​(int bidPrice)
      a boolean method where bid price can be set only if the input is valid
      Parameters:
      bidPrice - - the price of the bid
      Returns:
      isValid

    • description

      public String description()
      a method that returns the info in a bid object into a neat sentence
      Returns:
      ("Bidder's ID: " + bidID + " | Price($): " + bidPrice + " | Bid's date: " + bidDate + "\n")
